room_title: Escape room "Playoff Panic" by The Loop Escape Room in Akron
review: Went with my husband, brother and friend. Had a blast. Didn’t escape but got pretty far I think. The couple who run this room are really sweet and made the experience an enjoyable one. I’d absolutely do another room if they came up with one.

room_title: Escape room "Playoff Panic" by The Loop Escape Room in Akron
review: Great time was had by all. This room was challenging and enjoyable for young and old alike. Kept us laughing, thinking and excited for the next clue! It's a must do, something the whole family can enjoy together.

room_title: Escape room "Playoff Panic" by The Loop Escape Room in Akron
review: Very well done! We didn't make it, but they let us finish after time expired, and it took an extra couple minutes.And for those that may be wondering, even though ​it is at a church, it is not a religious​ theme.

room_title: Escape room "Playoff Panic" by The Loop Escape Room in Akron
review: This was a wonderful activity. We had a great time. This was our first experience with an escape room, and it was a fun. The staff was wonderful. I love that it is non-profit and it benefits their youth group. I recommend this to anyone looking for a fun time!
